content.c_answer2: Witness for the Prosecution is 2 hours 15 minutes (incl. interval). Performances starting at 2:30pm finish at approx. 4:45pm, performances starting at 3pm finish at approx. 5:15pm, and performances starting at 7:30pm finish at approx. 9:45pm.
content.name: How long is Witness for the Prosecution and when does it finish?
content.question: How long is Witness for the Prosecution and when does it finish?
